attributes.action: put more bobbys on the beat and stop the lawless society we live in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr prime minister sir
please address the issues of lawlessness in great britain we the electorate demand to be safe in our homes on our streets anywhere at all
stop making it far to easy for these yobs to get in and out of trouble by giving these people a easy life
lets build more prisons lets have chain gangs lets have these waisters putting something back in the community
lets have the cane back in schools
i know the vast majority of people would agree ask the people on the streets not the do gooders its the do gooders that have made this once great country the laughing stock of the world
and lets beg the question why are so many peoplie leaving our shores to live abroad why oh why cant the ministers concerned see that all these valuble assets or being snapped up in other countries please please please
do something sharp im a very proud citizen of the uk but of late i have very little to be proud of and finally we need tighter immigration in this country to stop all the immigrants from bleeding our country and resources dry
proud to be british JUST

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
